title: Ilounon?
description: An Early Roman hilltop oppidum, Ilunum was abandoned in the second century A.D. and then reoccupied in Late Antiquity (ca. A.D 590) as a Visigothic episcopal see during the Byzantine-Visigothic war. It was finally abandoned in the ninth century and the population was resettled in a new foundation, Murcia.

properties.description: 1:1 million scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 20327
